infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app needs access to health data to track your fitness metrics and provide personalized insights.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app needs to write health data to sync your workout information with Apple Health.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app uses motion data to track your workouts and activity levels.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location data to track your running and cycling routes.
